Content: ProjectRoot /*Root directory of the current project*/
ProjectSessionsRoot /*Root directory of all sessions of this project*/
Session /*Root directory of the current session*/

CommandLineArgs.Name: g_command_line_args
Content: "Root", "The directory to initialize the vfs with. this is similar as setting the working root directory"
"Help", "This will list all command line arguments for the executable"
"BreakOnBoot", "Break on boot so you can attach a debugger"
